channel.title: Comments on: Windows 8 WinRT/Metro Missing UpdateSourceTrigger

item.title: By: Petr Bálek
item.dc:creator: Petr Bálek
item.description:
Thank you very much! Microsoft dislikes developers :/
Petr The Czech Republic
item.content:encoded:
Thank you very much! Microsoft dislikes developers :/

Petr
The Czech Republic

item.title: By: csb
item.dc:creator: csb
item.description: Thanks for this solution. Windows 8 app support for XAML is totally weak!
item.content:encoded: Thanks for this solution. Windows 8 app support for XAML is totally weak!

item.title: By: Frode Nilsen
item.dc:creator: Frode Nilsen
item.description: This shortcoming is one of the more irritating one of Win8 Metro. I haven't found a better solution than yours yet either - at least this is better than manually coding KeyDown listeners for every TextBox you need this functionality on. Thanks for sharing!
item.content:encoded: This shortcoming is one of the more irritating one of Win8 Metro. I haven’t found a better solution than yours yet either – at least this is better than manually coding KeyDown listeners for every TextBox you need this functionality on. Thanks for sharing!
